content.detailedDescription: Sighting report:   i saw u f o over houston one day before alison tropical depresion this air craft was wicked

Sighting report:   this happended in 1993 in killeen, tx.  i
 cannot remember the exact day but i know it was around the
 middle of march because my husband was at ntc in california and
 i was alone.  we lived in these two story apartments off base
 (fort hood) and it was evening close to 10:00 at night. it was a
 very clear night, no clouds and fairly warm for that time of
 year.  my neighbor was visiting with me her name was wendy
 hartman ( not sure of last name ) but anyways we were visiting
 when her little brother who lived with them came over and said
 there were weird lights in the sky.  we went outside to the
 balcony and looked out.  the lights appeared to be coming from
 over the fort hood air feild area.  at first we told him that
 they were just strobe lights because they seemed to be making
 some weird pattern in the sky.  but as we watched we started to
 get kind of freaked out because the lights were very bright, i
 mean as in very very strong not light like an artifical beamed
 strobe light would make.  what was really strange was what these
 lights were doing.  there appeared to be maybe between 10-15
 separate lights or globes becasue they were not small. they were
 white globes.  they moved around the sky all scattered up and
 down in all directions. then to our amazement they all lined up
 in a straight line and moved together, forward, then backward
 then up and down, then a few whould shoot away real fast then
 come back. some of the globes would shoot straight up into the
 sky real fast and disapear and then return slowly back down. 
 some of them would go diagonally and then appear to hover and
 not move.  it was a really fantastic show of some type of
 areodynamics because as we watched we could not believe the
 positions these lights were acomplishing only to come back
 together in a straight line and go up and down and diagonally,
 horizontally and every which way.  another neighbor came out at
 that time and stood out there and watched with us too for some
 time and thought it was really srtange, he ruled out strobe
 lights becasue of the globes light intensity and what they were
 doing in the air as if each single globe has a mind of its own,
 we ruled out helichopters or any type of aircraft because of the
 speed and the directions the lights were going.  finally we got
 real creeped out and said that something was no right especially
 since the lights seemed to be coming from fort hoods air field. 
 our nieghbor suggested we call iii corps and report it.  i
 called iii corps and reported the sighting and i remember the
 operator was really egsasperated because she said that she had
 been recieving similar phone calls all night long.  i have no
 doubt in my mind that what we saw that night was not an airplane
 or strobe lights. it has been years now since the incident but i
 have seen shows or reports over the years of lights like the
 ones we saw and it creeps me out becasue what i saw was so
 similar to some of these other accounts.  i dont know if you can
 investigate something so old but i am sure that if you call fort
 hood, tx and ask iii corps to show you records of the blotter
 reports for the month of march 1993 there has to be record of
 all those phone calls that were called in on that night.  that
 is all i have.  i am writing this because my husband encouraged
 me to write to you because it has bothered me all these years
 about those lights and i know i am not crazy but i know what i
 saw.

Sighting report:   at previous location:

901 walter st.
bedford, tx   76022
county: tarrant

weather conditions: bright & sunny day - no clouds...

sighting:  midday, on, or about, late spring (say march, april,
 may, june, 1986 - 1988),  or early fall (say august, september,
 or october, 1986 - 1988), {dates of sighting become rather
 fuzzy, though), i was witness, along with my entire family at
 the time (mother, brother, and sister) to a stationary ufo over
 bedford, tx.  i would estimate it was no further distant than
 1.0 - 1.50 miles up to the northeast (possibly over the highway
 - sr 183/121) in an apparent "observation" mode.  possibly, it
 was a "scout" ship...  maybe, it  forgot  to turn on it s
 cloaking device.  nonetheless, the u.F.O. just hung up there in
 broad daylight for what seemed awhile, 15 - 20 minutes, at about
 a 35 - 45 degree angle.  the appearance was completely round, as
 it appeared about a  dime  to  nickel  - sized coin could
 completely cover it and in exactly the same dimensions
 (perfectly round appearing object).  the u.F.O. had five smaller
 perfect circles inside the outer perfect circle (it s body). 
 each of the five perfect circles were the same size & appeared
  whiter  (white hot) to the sight.  therefore, i imagined they
 were it s engines, though they might not have been...

there were no photographs, or videotape, of the event, and as far
 as i know no one has ever come forward with this information
 before.

i walked from the back yard, to the front yard, during the
 duration of this sighting, but when i went inside the house to
 retrieve an item (like tea, binoculars, etc.) it was gone upon
 returning outside.  the u.F.O. might ve noticed it was
 noticed...

now, the u.S. air force might  rationalize  it all & say "oh, it
 was just a weather ballon," or other some such thing.  even
 though there was a light wind blowing from the west, the object
 (believed u.F.O.) did not move (rise, dip, or move at angles, or
 side to side), but remained stationary throughout.

this was an actual event.
content.summary: Witness saw stationary object in sky for about 20 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting report:   my account goes back to autumn 1978.  i know
 this will make it impossible to investigate but i want to let
 someone outside of my family and immediate friends to know. i
 lived in williamsburg, ohio at the time of the sighting. i was
 outside with my friend that lived next door. his father had cut
 down the dead corn stalks and we were bundling them together. we
 saw something coming toward us low over the horizon.  at first
 we thought it was our neighbor that has a gyrocopter, but we
 remembered he had crashed and wss in the hospital. as it closed
 in on us we knew right away it was something we had never
 experienced before. it hovered over us silently. the only noise
 we heard was like a brisk wind. it was no more than twenty feet
 overhead at this time. we stood nearly paralyzed with awe. it
 hovered for what seemed like 3-4 minutes. it then raised in
 elevation to about 50 feet instantaneously. we went to my house
 next door and had my older brother come outside to the second
 story porch. my brother did not believe what he was seeing. the
 craft would make several more manuevers...All at angles and
 speeds unobtainable by military aircraft known. i am a very
 realistic and down to earth person, but what i saw that autumn
 evening will change my outlook on everything in life.

Sighting report:   at approximatly 5pm in the afternoon jan 2005,
 i was looking out my kitchen window when i notice a jet airliner
 veer sharply off course traveling northwest avoiding a small
 black arrowhead shaped object traveling i would say 3-600 miles
 per hour which passed directly overhead of me heading due south.
 i figured it was a stealth fighter. but when it got above me i
 determined it was not due to the pointed arrow shape that looked
 nothing like a stealth fighter (it was too narrow pointed)and it
 was completly silent, about that time i noticed 2 more objects
 of the same configuration traveling the same speed and the same
 course following the same line as the first. on the third pass i
 really tried to get a look at the third craft and notice a
 slight glow not in the back of the object as you would think but
 from the front of the object at the point. i do not think this
 could be a government aircraft, but it could be possible. these
 objects produced no sound whatsoever and the did not veer one
 way or the other , not even to miss the on coming aircraft
 wheich veered away from them. it  excited me alot.

Sighting report:   dear sir or madam,

i just happened to come across your site browsing the web after
 seeing a television programme on area 51.  though having grown
 up in britain, i was in texas during the late 70s and early 80s
 off and on.

i saw that "ufo" that supposedly landed in dayton, texas i
 believe.  this was in 1979 or 80, i really don t remember the
 exact date.   i was in cleveland, texas which is 25 miles away. 
 this is a very rural sort of area and there s little else to do
 but go for a drive.  i was with a friend (he was driving) when
 we came to a stop sign at hwy 321 (which leads to dayton).  he
 stayed there at the stop sign and we were watching what appeared
 to be a very bright star, i was the first to notice (i believe i
 said "look at that star").  the star became brighter and
 brighter and larger.  very soon, and i don t remember how, the
 thing was right on top of us.  the thing was very large indeed
 and triangular shaped.  i m a bad judge of distance, but it
 seemed only a matter of feet above his pickup truck.  there were
 lights of a different colour on each cornor i remember.  but, to
 have been so very bright on approach, the underside seemed dark,
 and i could see no brightness at all. 

the thing sort of swirled around the top of us and made for the
 direction of dayton. it s leaving gave the very same appearance.
 it looked like a very large very bright star and became smaller
 the further it got away.  

really, at the time, i didn t think "ufo" etc. although this was
 a very strange event indeed. all  i remember saying to my
 friend, "that s odd, if that were a plane of that size and that
 close it would blow us off the road" (those were my exact
 words).  but, it was very different from a plane, there was
 absolutely no sound at all.  this is what really gave us "the
 creeps".

i thought no more about it.  then a very short while later i read
 about an event in dayton, texas in the houston newspaper, where
 some family came across some strange object and got radiation
 sickness or something.  and they were suing the air force.  i
 thought perhaps this is what we d seen, but after reading that
 article wanted no part of it.  thinking of it now still gives me
 "the creeps".  this thing no doubt approached us, and it could
 have been us contacted by it.  thinking of it now, probably the
 only thing saving us was the fact that we were just on the
 outskirts of town, not remote enough.  so the thing made for
 some remoter area near dayton. i can t promise you i know what
 it was, but i ve never seen anything as strange before or since.

Sighting report:   this happened back in the 70 s at night.Saw a
 bright object high in the sky.Thought it was a star at first,but
 it was shiny.It moved suddenly from side to side.It
 zigzaged,forward,& back in the sky.Very fast,and suddenly went
 up out of sight.I knew,i had seen something strange.

Sighting report:   this siting happened many years ago, and i
 have been telling it to family members, but never knew where to
 go to log an "official" report that may be of some use to
 someone. im now 36, this siting happened when i was 14 (1983). 
 it was very early in the moring, id estimate the time to be 4:15
 am or so, it was pre-dawn or so, with no lightening happening on
 the horizon.  i think it was early spring - it was cool - but
 not mitten-cold, and it was mostly clear, with just a few
 "scuttle" clouds around.  i was on my morning paper route.  i
 was delivering papers on coe street, in woonsocket ri, near the
 intersection of coe and providence street, and was delivering
 papers to the houses across the street from the holy family
 church rectory.  there is a big parking lot associated with the
 church.  i heard a low rumbling, similar to an idling
 18-wheeler.  i was convinced there was an 18-wheeler nearby
 idling, and being a cautious young lady, i remember looking at
 the parking lot to see the truck and why they might be hanging
 around, and not seeing one, glancing up and down the street
 looking for it.  this is when i noticed a dull orange glow
 hitting the street from where i was standing to about 70 feet
 down from me, towards the intersection of providence street. 
 the glow was similar to that cast by high intensity sodium
 lighting, but with a stronger orange hue.  the glow immediately
 had me looking up, where to my utter surprise, i found the
 source of the low rumbling sound.  a large "craft" of some sort
 was moving very slowly over the street.  it was rectangular in
 shape, and i can only explain it as a massive lumbering barge
 kind of thing.  i wouldnt begin to guess on size, because i
 couldnt judge how high it was, but it was def. higher than the
 rectory building - and it pretty much was obliterating the view
 of the sky over the road from my perspective - when i saw it, it
 was almost directy overhead.  the bottomside of the ship - the
 only portion i could see - had dozens of circular orange lights
 - the same color as vehicle parking lights - in a regular grid
 pattern along its entire width and length the spaces between the
 lights were in dark shadow and i could make no other detail
 other than its rectangular shape amongst the dark blue pre-dawn
 sky. it was one solid unit. it was moving very slow, and i got
 the sickening sense that it was scanning the ground below.  i
 was suddenly aware that i was possibly in the orange glow, and
 was terrified of the prospect that i might have been seen by any
 occupants on that thing.  i remember dropping my bike, and
 running to the nearest home, where i stood, hyperventilating, in
 thier screened porch, as the thing lumbered over the road in
 front of the house.  i remember dogs in the home barking
 excitedly.  i remember the glass panes in the house windows and
 door begin to audibly vibrate/resonate from the low frequency
 rumbling of that thing.  i stood frozen with fear in that porch
 for what seemed like an eternity, but was probably more like a
 couple of minutes.  i remember wondering if i should start
 banging on the door of the house and wake the people inside up. 
 before i decided upon an action however, the rumbling quickly
 faded, the glow on the street vanished.  after a few more
 minutes, when i had calmed down, and the dogs stopped barking, i
 left the porch and scanned the sky - as much of it as i could
 see from the front of my hiding place on the porch.  i could not
 see the object anywhere.  i still had the rest of my paper route
 to finish, which i did with record-breaking speed, and i was
 glad when the sky started to lighten up with early morning
 colors!

im most curious to know, if anyone else has ever reported similar
 craft anywhere else, and how often, and if there had been
 additional information - any contact with the crew of the craft?
  could this be some kind of military craft?  this does not fit
 the description of the usually stealthy quiet white saucers
 people report, and i know what transport helicopters look like. 
 please please respond (rachellandry@cox.Net) - what this thing
 might have been has been haunting me for years.

thank you

Sighting report:
day before carrying out the camping ufos of february of 2005 which directs professor reinaldo rios that offers all the last saturdays, friday, 18 of february of 2005 about the 6:30 p.M. i visiting the zone of highway 303 throughout the route between lajas and red cabo rojo country when it notices a presence of a luminic object suddenly moving of the west to this approximately. that moved quickly which i consider that average about 7 to 8 meters of a shining clear color. sound like a washing machine. it was to the dusk which i could notice clearly that well-known object. it went as to introduce itself to the stop of mounts. cam that uses was one of handle 200 35 mm. 
 http://groups.Msn.Com/_secure/0sgana2avxrio*q5alvoqj1!83pnnjdxx1!H11o!Tsoujusskqdl00isarzvveaktdxjgiuv*w8mthulro5srpez5d7j0bs*fx3ni!Na9wgz71a*tdb2pcg/picture%20202.Jpg?Dc4675506948689593898" some people stopped in highway 303 next to reinaldo rios to try to observe it but and close by same knowledge occurred to the police of the area including which another telefone call to near radial transmitters which we do not know if they gave pursuit to this news. in one of the radial programs to which i collaborate present this news expressing that if others hade it been present at they confirmed calling to the transmitter by phone 1-787-835-1130 / 1-787-835-3130. sighting the 18 of february of 2005 to the 6:30 p.M. throughout highway 303 between lajas to cabo rojo on mountains of the sierra bermeja.
it reports witness and investigator prof. reinaldo rios

Sighting report:   "my son and i were coming from a pee-wee
 hockey clinic in phila.. we were driving down spruce st. in
 phila.,pa. on our way back to the expressway when a very silvery
 cylinder shaped object caught my eye. it was a beautiful bright
 sunny saturday morning so there s no mistaking exactly what i
 saw. it was moving slowly through the sky. it was moving
 horizontally not vertically. it was a very brilliant
 silver/metallic color. the sun was reflecting off of it making
 it really,really shiny. i watched it for a good 15-20 seconds. i
 had to concentrate on the road. i told my son to look at it. he
 watched it longer than me. he told me that it was flying slow
 and the it flew away fast. it was the height that a hellicopter
 would fly in the sky."

Sighting report:   this was january 1st 2002 at approximately
 4:20pm. sky was clear, still daylight. i had just started my
 security rounds at my post which was at a warehouse in ne
 philadelphia near the county correctional facility. i watched an
 airplane flying overhead( probably just taking off from phila.
 international judging from the altitude) and saw the object
 hovering in the air close by. the object was an inverted black
 pyramid. there were no noticable features on it. no markings,
 windows, lights, jets, nothing. it appeared t be solid. after a
 minute it began to move.It made no sound. at first i thought it
 could be a balloon or something similar. but its altitude, speed
 and direction remained steady as it flew over i-95. i expected
 to see the cars under it ot slow down or stop. none did. it
 seemed to be spinning slightly. i could see the sun reflected
 off of each side that faced it. after maybe five minutes, it
 vanished. i don t know if it took off faster than i could see,
 but one minute it was there, clear as day, then it just wasn t.
 people have asked if maybe i was hungover from new year s.
 knowing that i had to work that day for the first time ever,
 that was the first time i did not drink on new year s eve. i
 would feel better if this was that black triangle that s
 commonly reported.It isn t. i have searched unsuccessfully since
 then for similar reports or pictures of it. this is the only
 "craft" sighting, but a week later i saw what i ve seen called
 an orb hovering briefly over the warehouse.

Sighting report:   i have two photographs taken just seconds
 apart. it was just before dark. #37 was taken on tuesday
 10/05/2004 at 9:58:55pm. picture #38 was also taken on tuesday
 10/05/2004 but at 9:58:56pm. now, at the time when i took these
 shots it was all about the sunset.  a few months ago i decided
 to use one of these photos for my comuter desktop, i look at it
 everyday.  i don t know what was different tonight but i saw a
 little speck on the screen that didn t seem right. so, i went to
 retrieve the shot from it s file. i noticed that there were two
 "specks" not one. i tried to zoom in on them but it gets too
 distorted.  however, the strangest thing about this is... it s
 not my first sighting.  my first sighting was nine or ten years
 ago, i reported that sighting as well. but, even stranger than
 that is,the ufo s in these photos, look exactly like the one i
 saw years ago.  also, these sightings are within maybe one mile
 of each other.  so, check that out!  good luck, i can t wait to
 hear from you.

Sighting report:   the following is an email sent from my son
 describing a ufo he and my boyfriend saw in the early morning
 hours of january 24, 2005. they were traveling on hway 38,
 heading towards the coast for home, and had just passed the
 scottsburg bridge and noticed the lights over the umpqua river.
 "we were driving, obviously, and i noticed some lights on the
 water. the first thing i noticed was the way they were moving.
 horizontally, but not bobbing as if in the water. plus, they
 moved too smoothly to be any normal object moving across water
 without making a sound. that struck me as odd, and the color was
 also weird. it looked like a normal yellowish light, but as they
 moved it seemed to fade into blues and reds, and it never stayed
 solid. as i was watching the lights, i noticed i couldn t see
 past them. if i looked several feet above them i could see the
 trees on the mountain, but looking at and between them was
 black. i couldn t make out anything, as if trying to look around
 in pur darkness. the lights moved closer together, and seemed as
 if a couple of them were going in and out of each other. again,
 this just seemed unnatural. they made no noise that i could
 hear."
well, i guess that s about it... cory

Sighting report:   when these sightings took place, i didn t
 realise i could report them, so it s been a while.  six years
 ago i had two sightings around the same time.  it was
 springtime, i was 17 years old and i lived on the 17th floor of
 an apartment building, facing east.  the first sighting took
 place in the afternoon.  i went to alternative school so i was
 home when my family was at work or school.  the sky was clear, a
 very brilliant blue actually, and there was this one very
 strange giant white cloud right smack in the middle of the sky
 according to my perspective from my window.  i was sort of
 intrigued by the strange cloud, so i looked at it for a long
 time.  then these little dark triangular shapes started to "zip
 in and out of the cloud" [quoting zetatalk, i read that on there
 a year or so later which was obviously breath taking ... don t
 knock and/or diss zetatalk to me].  anyway, at first i thought
 they were birds.  but their movement was so mechanical and in 15
 years i almost never saw black birds there, only seagulls.  i
 got my binoculars and i saw that they were not birds but black
 shiny triangles-type thingies.  it went on for a long time.  but
 that was all there was to it.  the second sighting happened
 about a week later.  i was lying in bed, and it was after 11 pm.
  i was suddenly compelled to look up at the sky.  it was a
 perfectly clear night and i saw this solid round shape that
 looked like it was made of light.  it wasn t too far above my
 building, and i saw it just as it was nearing the roof.  before
 it reached the edge of the roof, it faded away and was gone just
 like that.  i ve had so many other experiences since these
 sightings, but no other sightings, so i ma justa gonna keepa
 thosea to ma selfa :)

Sighting report:   i was at fresco shopping mall, i saw five
 ufo s moving all over the sky.It happened around 3:00 pm , the
 sky was bright blue. the objects turned colors , red , white and
 blue.. they were a pertty good size and the move fast and slow.
 the would apper and disapper. it was someing that i have never
 seen before in my life.

Sighting report:   this was several years ago whil i lived in
 jenks oklahoma.It mustve been 1989 in the spring about may or
 so. i was with a friend, we were outside in his front yard 
changing his tire to his bronco, it was a very nice warm day
 outside and it was only a few white fluffy clouds in the sky. i
 dont know why i looked up but i did and i say an unusual thing.
 now we do live  within a few miles of a small but active airport
 and also there is the tulsa intl airport around so i am used to
 seeing aircraft of all kinds in the sky and this wasnt anything
 i had ever seen 
before. first of all there was absolutley no sound, it was 
a crimson red in color. it was moving slowly across the sky from
 north to south in a straight line. its shape was triangular and
 it was "flying" point first but was rotating on its axis.It was
 hard to determine how high up it was however it was for sure not
 as high as the clouds.
i asked my friend if he knew what it was he said no. after about
 2 mins the object then just suddenly accelerated incredibly fast
 and then vanished. ive see jets and jet fighters move at sonic
 speeds and this thing wouldve outpaced all of them. to this day
 ive never seen anything else quite like it or even heard of
 anythign else. i found your website after doing a google search
 for ufo , and i only did that after seeing a tv special on sci
 fi channel. i dunno what else to say other than i can be emailed
 or called for further questions if you wish. also i have told
 you everything to the best of my ability and is a true and
 honest statement.  thnk you for your time!

Sighting report:   at approximately 9 pm on 3-30-05 my 8 yo
 daughter and i went into our backyard to try to observe the moon
 for a school project. we were admiring the clear sky and the
 many stars when my daughter suddenly called out to me - "dad,
 dad, look - something weird." i had my 9 mo old son in my arms
 and so wasn t able to move very quickly into the clearing where
 she was standing. however, when i did look up into the sky i saw
 what appeared to be two very dim lights (separated by about the
 width of one/two fingers of outstretched arm and with one very
 slightly ahead of the other)racing across the sky at an
 extremely high rate of speed. they almost looked like
 sattelites, but were moving very very fast but remained in exact
 same position in relation to each other (as if they were
 attached). there was no accompanying sound whatsoever. when i
 asked her what she had seen - she replied that it was a triangle
 with blinking lights on the tips of the wings. this thing was
 moving fast enough to cross the entire visible sky in about 4 or
 5 seconds. i have seen may meteorites and sattelites but this
 appeared unlike anything i have seen. my daughter drew a picture
 of what she saw and it is a black delta with lights on the
 wingtips.  i have heard of giant black deltas, but she certainly
 has not. i went back outside to look around and i did see an
 impressive meteorite approximately 5 min later, but this went in
 opposite direction and the meteorite left a nice trail, whereas
 this other thing left none. i have never seen a ufo before and i
 only wish i had seen this thing better. we are in se ohio.

Sighting report:   i took pictures of ice on trees from a storm
 in late december 2004 at about 5:45 pm. i did not see anything
 at the time, but after the film was developed my wife noticed
 the objects high in the sky on the photo. under examination with
 a magnifier the objects appear to be five spheres decending in
 size from left to right, the largest one being brownish in color
 in its entirety, while the other four are brown and white. these
 objects appear on the negative as well.

Sighting report:   six years ago while setting on my roof my son
 and i saw a small globe about the size of a beach ball. it went
 right over my roof and hit way back in the dark woods behind my
 house.I wanted to go  and look for it but it was late and had
 too go to bed. for some reason i could not sleep something was
 drawing me too the back woods. my family asleep i went on back
 in the dark without a flash light which i think was pretty
 stupid. i looked for about a hour and a half and then i went
 back too my home by way of the back yard. after i got there i
 set on my bench and began too smoke a cigarette. i had taken a
 few draws when a weak voice said those things can kill you. i
 put my cigarette out and said "is someone there can i help
 you,where are you,?  "yes walk too the big tree in front of you
 then you can see me. the tree was about thirty feet or so from
 me so i walk over too it.Where are you i said i cant see you.
 the voice said light your lighter and then you can. i light my
 lighter and what i saw made me say oh my god and dropped my
 lighter.I am not very good in spelling out what i saw.You have
 my phone number gave me a call. i can tell you better then i can
 spell or type.

Sighting report:    on feb. 25,2005 at about 10:20 p.M. i was
 leaving a bar in glen ullin, n.D. (50 miles west of bismarck)
 and heading home. directly south of the area i noticed an
 unusual light in the sky at what looked about 4500 feet in the
 air and about 8 miles south of where i was, over a local lake. i
 watched it for a few minutes and noticed that the light got very
 bright then dim a few times. it was sort of blue white and
 reminded me of a search light on the bottom of a helicopter.
 while watching it i noticed another light(not the same color,
 almost slightly amber)come towards the first light from the east
 then stop moving after getting close to the first light. i knew
 that this must be a ufo  and called the people in the bar(5) to
 come see. we watched for a couple minutes, during which time a
 small plane flew almost between the object and us. we went back
 into the bar and talked about it for awhile, one person said he
 had seen ufos many times before. after a short time, i decided
 to drive home(about 35 miles north) during the drive i watched
 the object occasionally through my rearview mirror. after about
 23 miles i stopped, got out of my truck and saw that the object
 was still in the sky but had gotten higher up and about 25 miles
 further north. by this time i could see an outline ot the
 craft s shape(chevron) and that the craft was in my estimation
 about three times the size of a 747 jet. (if i had held a
 quarter at arm s length it would not cover the object) i
 continued my drive the rest of the way to the town i live in and
 after that drive the object was still in the air, only a little
 higher and further north. the drive took about 40-45 minutes. i
 went into another bar for about an hour and when i came out the
 object was gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting report:   on the 28th of february,2004,it had snowed and
 we had gotten clost to a foot of snow.The sky had just
 cleared,and it was evening as the sun sets about 6:00 pm.On the
 western horizon,i saw a star-like light,very bright,manuevering
 around a wispy cloud,very fast.I was stunned at how it moved.My
 wife and daughter also saw it,and my daughter and i also saw two
 black discs on the horizon,they were flat on the bottom,so they
 werent perfectly round.My daughter saw them first,and i only
 caught a glimpse of it.I was in the navy,im a skeptical
 guy....But what moves like what i saw around that cloud???What
 are the black discs???Some years before i also saw a disc in the
 evening sky that was a funny mushroom color.I was working at
 rent-a- center and i stopped the truck and got out to look at it
 it.Other drivers did too,we were on a country road near concord
 nc...Our comments were that it has to be a balloon,but it was
 bigger than the moon and quite a distance away,it was disc
 shaped,but was flat at the bottom,like the black discs,last
 february.I also saw one night when i was doing a security job at
 a cell tower whose strobe light kept malfunctioning,a funny
 light that took off on the horizon----it was 2 flashing gold
 lights,not yellow or amber---these lights were gold---and they
 fused into one red light and accelerated into the sky at an
 anlge faster than i ever thought possible.....Im not going to
 say it was extraterrestrial...All im reporting is what i
 saw...There are other incidents in my life,but these are the
 most recent as well as the ones best etched in my mind.....I
 hope that we have craft that move like this,but then i hope we
 dont......All i know is that i simply hate seeing things that i
 cant explain!!!

Sighting report:   this happened in the summer of 1980. a friend
 was with me and we were driving down around mineral springs
 around waxhaw, nc that was in the country and i don t remember
 seeing any other vehicles on the road that night. when we came
 across a ring of green lights my friend thought it was some kind
 of bugs which i said that it didn t look like bugs to me and
 when my car stopped running and my lights went out we decided to
 get out of the car and check out the green ringed lights coming
 down out of the sky. after that i don t remember much. i woke up
 in my bed fully clothed and there was probably about 4 hours of
 missing time and apparently i  had taken my friend to his home
 neither one of us remembers anything at that point. my buddy
 still does not like to talk about it to this day. i had nose
 bleeds for a couple of months after that. no alcohol or drugs
 was involved.
Sighting report:   blue lights where flashing over my large cornfeild and when i went outside they turned of and then i heard a distinked sizzle and the long trapazoid shape disappeared

Sighting report:   this experience had happen some years ago and
 there had been a reason i was reluctant to report it. the day
 the ufo made its appearance was sept 14th 2000, in monroe twp.
 n.J., a little before sunset. i, however, did not discover it
 had been there until i had had the pictures, which were taken
 that day, for at least a few weeks or even a couple of months.
 it was my wedding day and i was quite uneasy. i just wed my
 foreign, arabic husband in a civil ceremony at the local
 courthouse. i was considering all our differences, my
 uncertainties and doubts from right after the moment i had said,
 93i do=94. we drove back to my parent=92s house and i was uplifted to
 see a rainbow in the sky. at certain angles it gave the visual
 effect as if landing directly upon my parents home. my new
 husband and myself ran to stand in the front yard as my parents
 took a number of pictures. the rainbow slowly faded away and at
 this time we all took turns posing for several more shots. the
 picture in question is of my mother and myself standing under a
 tree in the back yard. a bright egg shaped object is in the
 background against a dusk sky of bright orange. i do not know
 why i didn=92t notice it straight away; perhaps i was so
 distracted by the other photos with the rainbow. currently i
 only have one picture of this object from the actual negative
 (non-digital camera). i do have copies scanned from it into
 digital format. i=92m not certain where the negatives are, though
 i=92m pretty certain i have them. i have recently looked into ufo
 media and investigations so to find a group who is critical and
 will honestly examine what i have, rather then just adding it to
 a slew of falsehoods as if it is fact without proper scrutiny. i
 truly would like to be certain if it is what it may appear to
 be. i do not want to send it off to here and there. i am a
 published author of a serious moral; (at least to me) futuristic
 fiction work and do not wish for my name to be tainted with an
 association to a discreditable group. this is why i have decided
 to approach your network, after some research of your work,
 dedications and associations, to offer to send you a digital
 copy of the picture, and/or meet so the photo itself can be
 examined. i guess since i=92m going through with this i will also
 now hunt to locate the negatives. upon finding them i will make
 copies as well as having it ready for any examinations. the
 reason i have been reluctant to report, is because up until
 literally this week, my husband has been ever so against the
 idea of et=92s and ufo possibilities. we then watched a show on
 the matter a couple of days ago and then i showed him some video
 clips of ufos on the web. he was shocked at the world trades
 center clip, and he now states he believes in the possibility at
 95% degree. i=92m amazed at the turn around because not only is he
 entertaining the possibilities himself, but he also is talking
 about what i had showed him to his arabic friends and sharing
 the video clip site with them and all with some serious
 excitement. i now can finally share what could be our own,
 special, personal experience with a ufo, with finally his
 support rather then fear.

Sighting report:   my husband myself and my children saw 5
 sightings and 2 pesrsonal events upon ourselves, and on at a
 funeral  in marlboro, mass. i experienced a type of
 awake-paralysis--teeth were clamped shut and i could not move.
 my daughter has had numerous accounts of this happening to her.
 she claims she also saw small white creatures surrounding her
 bed when that happened. that was in nashua, nh here where we
 live now. one of the strange events happened with my parents and
 my motner-in-law as witness. a huge monster flash of light came
 in a side window near our house in the woods and streaked
 through the house-also in the 1980 s. i will write all of these
 cases down for proper documentation. finally. pn

Sighting report:    fall of 1956 or 57, newport, nh
my mother related this ufo experience to me. while i was there,
 too, i was too small to remember it (i was born in 1954).

my mother, the woman who usually babysat us, my brother and i
 were all in our back yard. it was just after dusk and getting
 dark. my mom and the other lady were dipping apples that had
 fallen from the tree in the back yard into a sulphur solution to
 kill the hornets that were feeding inside of them (to this day,
 that part of the story sounds as bizarre as the ufo part of the
 story itself!). my brother started crying because a hornet got
 in his boot and stung him. but just then, a disk shaped object
 came out of the sky and hovered near us. it had a section in the
 middle that was made of glass through which could be seen bright
 flames burning. my mother felt like it was about the distance
 away as the top of a telephone pole, yet she felt the impulse to
 just reach up and touch it...It seemed so close. and then the
 thing shot up straight into the sky at a supernatural speed and
 disappeared.

Sighting report:   i am a polce officer.  i was about a half mile
 outside of my patrol area in a wide open field away from
 residential and commercial areas.  i went there to urinate
 without anyone seeing me.  it was 0100 hrs on 3-2-05.  the sky
 was very clear, no clouds, and many stars visable.  the moon was
 in the south east sky, low and very yellow.  as i stood just
 outside my patrol car, i had my head on a swivel just to make
 sure i was not being watched (i have jailed people for doing
  what i was doing) i was standing by a cell phone tower, about
 100 ft tall.  something caught my eye in the sky.  it was a
 milky gray color and moving directly overhead.  it was about
 150-200ft up.  it traveled over me with no sound at all, and no
 lights. it was concealed very well as the color of the objest
 matched the sky very closely, it was not black, but kind of deep
 gray and blended very well with the sky that was sort of white
 washed by city lights.  as it traveled north west over head at
 about 25mph, it slowly blended with the color of the night sky,
 but i could tell it was still there because the stars were
 disapearing as it passed.  it was not that big, maybe the size
 of a bus, and had an odd shape.  it instantly reminded me of the
 galla kite i had when i as a kid.  all i could do was stare at
 it, and try to figure it out.  i sat on a long stretch of
 highway running radar the rest of the night trying to see it
 again, but i never did.  the shape was very odd.  it seemed to
 have some sort of cabel or tube dangling from it, similar to the
 huge planes that refuel jets in mid air.  it was close enough to
 me that it would have been heard if it was a plane.  as i drew
 it on paper, it looked more like a snail, with a long tube
 dangling underneath.  sorry no photos, and i now understand why
 there are not more photos of sightings.  i spent all the time i
 could have been taking pictures, trying to filter my brain to
 identify the object.  before you can get to a camera, the thing
 is gone.  i now underatand that people that see ufos do not
 immediately want them to be ufo s, but they instinctively try to
 make it familiar, and when it is realized that it is not, it s
 too late.  don t know what it was.
